Item ID4740

Bolt racks are ammunition exclusively used by the Karil's crossbow. They are a reward from Barrows with at least 881[1] reward potential, purchased from Ak-Haranu's Exotic Shop. on the Port Phasmatys docks or the Last Man Standing shop.

Unlike other bolts, they always disappear after being fired and cannot be retrieved by Ava's devices.

[[File:Bolt rack detail.png|left|140px]]
'''Bolt racks''' are [[ammunition]] exclusively used by the [[Karil's crossbow]]. They are a reward from [[Barrows]] with at least 881{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Kieren|url=https://twitter.com/JagexKieren/status/705428283509366785|date=3 March 2016|archiveurl=https://archive.is/sB4lx|archivedate=2 September 2017|quote=You guys wanted info on Barrows loot, here it is... Full size: [http://i.imgur.com/oZSMkAX.png] Explained the best I can!}} reward potential, purchased from [[Ak-Haranu's Exotic Shop.]] on the [[Port Phasmatys]] docks or the [[Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing|Last Man Standing shop]].

Unlike other bolts, they always disappear after being fired and '''cannot''' be retrieved by [[Ava's device]]s.
